name: plane simulator 2023
description:
THE MOST IMMERSIVE EXPERIENCE OF 2003!

Celebrate the new millenium in your brand new plane! Using State of the Art Terrain modification, animated textures, realtime shadow and physics, as well as a nearly INFINITE number of UNIQUE and CUSTOMIZABLE COLLECTIBLES, what is there not to love about Plane Simulator 2007?

While there is only one place accessible (?) in the game at the moment (it takes a lot of effort to make a plane, believe me), I will add more as time continues. As added motivation on my part, I personally pledge to add a new plane for every five (5) dollars donated. 

Btw, watch out for Clyde.

Enjoy Plane Simulator 2015!
